# Streamlit MUI

This Python library provides a flexible way to integrate Material UI components in your streamlit application. As of now this includes default and grouped bar charts. In near future a lot of MUI components will be provided by this library.

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
  - [Creating a Default Bar Chart](#creating-a-default-bar-chart)
  - [Creating a Grouped Bar Chart](#creating-a-grouped-bar-chart)
- [API Reference](#api-reference)
  - [BarChartConfig](#barchartconfig)
  - [BarData](#bardata)
  - [DefaultBarChartConfig](#defaultbarchartconfig)
  - [GroupBarData](#groupbardata)
  - [GroupSeriesData](#groupseriesdata)
  - [GroupBarChartConfig](#groupbarchartconfig)
- [License](#license)
